name: Google Maps
description: Provides directions, place details, and geographic data to enhance applications with mapping functionalities.

operations.name: Maps Geocode
operations.description: Convert an address into geographic coordinates

operations.name: Maps Search Places
operations.description: Search for places using Google Places API

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Optional center point for the search

operations.name: Maps Place Details
operations.description: Get detailed information about a specific place

parameters.name: place_id
parameters.description: The place ID to get details for

operations.name: Maps Distance Matrix
operations.description: Calculate travel distance and time for multiple origins and destinations

parameters.name: origins
parameters.description: Array of origin addresses or coordinates

parameters.name: destinations
parameters.description: Array of destination addresses or coordinates

operations.name: Maps Elevation
operations.description: Get elevation data for locations on the earth

parameters.name: locations
parameters.description: Array of locations to get elevation for
